record.field: Seller Request Mail By Admin To Seller
Thank You For Your Seller Registration.

div.style: font-family: 'Lucica Grande', Ubuntu, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: #FFF;
div.p: Thank you for registering to join our marketplace.
We have received your application and will review it shortly. Our team will contact you if additional information is needed or to provide further instructions.

a.style: background-color: #875A7B; padding: 10px; text-decoration: none; color: #fff; border-radius: 5px; font-size: 12px;

div.p: We appreciate your interest and look forward to welcoming you to our marketplace.
